report.title: Record counts by location for an event
report.description: Lists locations with mappable boundary output and the number of records within them. Requires the spatial_index_builder warehouse module to be enabled. This version is simpler than the summary report (it does not calculate minima and maxima) so is faster. It also requires survey and date range filters so is ideal for events such as bioblitzes.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM locations l1 JOIN ( SELECT l.id, count(o.id) as count FROM locations l JOIN (index_locations_samples ils JOIN cache_occurrences o ON o.sample_id=ils.sample_id AND o.survey_id=#survey_id# AND o.date_start>='#date_from#' AND o.date_start<'#date_to#' ) ON ils.location_id=l.id WHERE l.deleted=false AND l.location_type_id=#location_type_id# --AND l.public=true --AND l.code not like ('%+%') GROUP BY l.id, l.name ) as l2 ON l2.id=l1.id

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: location_type_id
param.description: Select the location type, or leave blank to not filter by location type.

param.name: quality
param.description: Quality level required of data to be included in the map.
param.lookup_values: V:Data must be verified,C:Data must be verified or certain,L:Data must be at least likely,!D:Include anything not dubious or rejected,!R:Include anything not rejected
